alert.note: Alert for Davison; Hanson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 7:19PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Hanson and Davison Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Murray and Cottonwood Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Mitchell. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, the higher banks overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 18.7 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu James River Mitchell 17.0 16.9 Mon 7 pm 17.6 18.1 18.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CDT.
